commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: The time has come. You all had your exams returned to you, right?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I was so nervous I barely got any sleep last night.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Same.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: The thought of possibly being the only one who scored below 60 had me too scared to sleep all night.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: The results are in whether we like it or not. From here on out, what happens happens.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Then let me ask... Did anybody score less than 60 in any of their subjects?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: That means everyone scored 60 or above in all subjects!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Woohoo!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I was cutting it pretty close, but I passed! I'm so happy! *Sob*

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: It was pretty close for me, too, but I hit the mark.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I managed to score better than ever before thanks to all of your lessons!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Me too. I've never seen a score like this before. Even my teachers were surprised. Rina-chan Board says, "Yay!"

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: We did it, guys! This is the best outcome we could've possibly asked for! You really gave it your all, huh? Now you can take it easy!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: The weight's finally been lifted off my shoulders.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Hey, why don't we all take a look at each other's tests?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I'm curious what the exams for our school's other courses are, so I'd like to see them too.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: It's not that interesting, but go right ahead.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Wow... You got over 90% on everything.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Whoa... So you really are super smart.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Hold up, what's that supposed to mean? What did you think of me before?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: As a draconian instructor...

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: A study supervisor...

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: A demon drill sergeant...

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: What the heck!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Pardon me. It seems you're all here.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Mifune.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I assume I don't need to explain why I have come. Please give me a concise report of your results.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: All of us got over 60 in every subject. Here's our exams so you can take a look for yourself.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: ...It seems you weren't just all talk.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: We kept our promise. This means our club won't be abolished nor suspended, correct?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Correct. I'll accept your results this time.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: This time?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Don't tell me you thought meeting your goal once would mean this is all over.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I don't believe the school idol club is beneficial to one's academic career. I will abolish it one day.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: However, I believe congratulations are due for today. I apologize for the interruption. I'll take my leave for now.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Ugh, what's her deal? Does she know how hard everyone worked?!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Why is she so against school idols?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Let's just leave it. We'll fight against anything she throws at us.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Karin's right, so why don't we just celebrate today's victory for now?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Oooh! Yeah, let's celebrate!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'd like to praise all of you for your great work on your exams. Cheers!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Cheers!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Now we can focus on the School Idol Festival.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: That's right! Now we all can live happily ever after.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: This isn't the end, Kana. We gotta put in some elbow grease from here!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: If we can get past those awful exams, we can get past anything!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Exactly. We've also got everyone from 's and Aqours with us too, so I'm sure we can pull it off!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, Eli's calling.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Speak of the devil.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hello? Yes, yes... Mmhmm, we all passed over here! What about everyone over at Otonokizaka?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Really?! What? And all of Aqours, too?! Wow! Ah, okay. I'll wait for you to send your results in. Bye!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Judging by the look on your face, it seems everything worked out for everyone?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yup! Everyone passed! She's going to send over everyone's scores now, so I can crown the queen dunce. Oh, looks like she's just sent them.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Let's see. Hmm... Got it. Everyone, the results are in for queen dunce. And the winner is...

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Oh dear... I really hope it's not me...

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Nico-chi and Kasumi! You both got the same scores, so I now pronounce you both queen dunce!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Whaaaaaat?! Nico and I scored the same?!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Karin, you look very relieved.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: What?! O-Oh please, not at all, Rina. Heh heh heh...

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: *Wail* But I tried harder than I ever have before! I can't believe I'm a queen dunce! Let me see for myself!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: O-Oh, sure. Here you go.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Urgh... We really did score the same. Oh, but it looks like there's only a one-point difference with Kanan. She can be princess dunce.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Ahaha, in any case, I'm gonna let everybody else know.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: No! Don't tell everyone I'm a queen dunce! I'm begging you!
